mdRecord.dcterms:title: Sissinghurst Castle Garden, general view
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Nicolson, Harold George (English writer, 1886-1968) [landscape designer]
Sackville-West, Vita (British author and gardener, 1892-1962) [landscape designer]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: From the center of the Rose Garden

Original manor house and moat built in the Middle Ages. Sackville-West and Nicholson purchased the property 1930 and created the gardens through the decade. Garden first opened to the public, 1938. Property taken over by the National Trust, 1967. [work]
